isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - ENGINE/EXHAUST BRAKE

svcproc.title: ENGINE/EXHAUST BRAKE
svcproc.para: In place of the Allison WT Hydraulic Retarder, a lower cost exhaust brake may be specified. The exhaust brake slows the vehicle by slowing the engine rpms, the rest of the driveline, and thus the vehicle. The engine rpms are slowed by restricting the exhaust gases out of the engine. The retarder is electrically connected to the transmission ECU so that it can operate in step with the ABS, transmission, and engine controllers.
